name: Thison’s creation #4 “ LORD BUDDHA & MUCHALINDA ”
description:
This illustration portrays a 6th-century tale about a mysterious creature called the “ Muchalinda ”. Snake or Dragon? Wild or Tame? Misunderstood or Myth? The “ Muchalinda ” emerges from a nearby tree where the Lord Buddha was meditating. The dragon serpent coils up around the lord buddha to keep him warm and places his vicious canopy-like hood over the lord buddha to protect him from the rain. 

Original concept and digital illustration by Thison Nayanake from Ceylon Metaverse. Copyright ownership is granted to token holders. Collectors can tag us on Twitter @CeylonMetaverse and/ or message us so we can grant you a letter of authenticity.
